nml_option.name: config_nCategories
nml_option.description: The number of ice thickness categories to use.

nml_option.name: config_nIceLayers
nml_option.description: The number of ice layers in the vertical direction to use.

nml_option.name: config_nSnowLayers
nml_option.description: The number of snow layers in the vertical direction to use.

nml_option.name: config_use_column_shortwave
nml_option.description: Run the shortwave radiation column physics calculation.

nml_option.name: config_use_column_vertical_thermodynamics
nml_option.description: Run the vertical thermodynamics column physics calculation.

nml_option.name: config_use_column_biogeochemistry
nml_option.description: Use biological and chemical tracers in the ice

nml_option.name: config_use_column_itd_thermodynamics
nml_option.description: Run the ice thickness distribution thermodynamics column physics calculation.

nml_option.name: config_use_column_ridging
nml_option.description: Run the ridging column physics calculation.

nml_option.name: config_use_column_snow_tracers
nml_option.description: Allow snow modifications plus additional snow tracers

nml_option.name: config_use_ice_age
nml_option.description: If true use the ice age tracer.

nml_option.name: config_use_first_year_ice
nml_option.description: If true use the first year ice tracer.

nml_option.name: config_use_level_ice
nml_option.description: If true use the level ice tracers.

nml_option.name: config_use_cesm_meltponds
nml_option.description: If true use the cesm meltponds tracers.

nml_option.name: config_use_level_meltponds
nml_option.description: If true use the level ice meltponds tracers.

nml_option.name: config_use_topo_meltponds
nml_option.description: If true use the topo meltpond tracers.

nml_option.name: config_use_aerosols
nml_option.description: Carry aerosols in the ice (NCAR scheme)

nml_option.name: config_use_effective_snow_density
nml_option.description: Use effective snow density

nml_option.name: config_use_snow_grain_radius
nml_option.description: Use prognosed snow grain radius aging

nml_option.name: config_use_special_boundaries_tracers
nml_option.description: Modify tracers in given boundary cells.

nml_option.name: config_use_brine
nml_option.description: Use the brine height tracer

nml_option.name: config_use_vertical_zsalinity
nml_option.description: Use z-salinity (with Bitz and Lipscomb 1999 thermodynamics)

nml_option.name: config_use_vertical_biochemistry
nml_option.description: Turn on the reaction terms for vertical biological tracers

nml_option.name: config_use_shortwave_bioabsorption
nml_option.description: Permit radiative transfer calculations that include dynamic chlorophyll and aerosols if active

nml_option.name: config_use_vertical_tracers
nml_option.description: Allow vertically resolved biological and chemical tracers

nml_option.name: config_use_skeletal_biochemistry
nml_option.description: Use the bottom 1-layer biogeochemistry

nml_option.name: config_use_nitrate
nml_option.description: Use the nitrate tracer

nml_option.name: config_use_carbon
nml_option.description: Use dissolved organic and inorganic carbon tracers

nml_option.name: config_use_chlorophyll
nml_option.description: Use the chlorophyll tracer (currently not implemented!)

nml_option.name: config_use_macromolecules
nml_option.description: Use ocean macromolecule to determine DOC fractions in ice-ocean coupling

nml_option.name: config_use_ammonium
nml_option.description: Use the ammonium tracer

nml_option.name: config_use_silicate
nml_option.description: Use the silicate tracer

nml_option.name: config_use_DMS
nml_option.description: Use DMS/DMSPd/DMSPp species

nml_option.name: config_use_nonreactive
nml_option.description: Use a non-reactive nitrate tracer

nml_option.name: config_use_humics
nml_option.description: Use the humic matter tracer

nml_option.name: config_use_DON
nml_option.description: Use dissolved organic nitrogen (proteins and amino acids)

nml_option.name: config_use_iron
nml_option.description: Use particulate and dissolved iron tracers

nml_option.name: config_use_modal_aerosols
nml_option.description: Aerosols are consistent with the CAM modal aerosol scheme

nml_option.name: config_use_zaerosols
nml_option.description: Aerosols in the ice use the z-aerosol scheme

nml_option.name: config_skeletal_bgc_flux_type
nml_option.description: Determines the ocean-ice fluxes of biogeochemistry for the bottom1-layer model: in Jin2006, the piston velocity is a function of ice growth/melt rate, in default, the piston velocity is constant

nml_option.name: config_scale_initial_vertical_bgc
nml_option.description: initialize the vertical ice biogeochemistry profile to scale with the salinity restart/initial profile

nml_option.name: config_biogrid_bottom_molecular_sublayer
nml_option.description: Sets the value of the ice/ocean molecular sublayer for the vertical biogeochemistry model

nml_option.name: config_biogrid_top_molecular_sublayer
nml_option.description: Sets the value of the ice surface molecular sublayer for the vertical biogeochemistry model

nml_option.name: config_bio_gravity_drainage_length_scale
nml_option.description: positive real number less than 1
nml_option.possible_values: Sets the gravity drainage length scale in the biological transport model

nml_option.name: config_zsalinity_molecular_sublayer
nml_option.description: Sets the ice/ocean molecular sublayer for the z-salinity model
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real number less than 1

nml_option.name: config_zsalinity_gravity_drainage_scale
nml_option.description: Sets the gravity drainage length scale in the z-salinity model

nml_option.name: config_snow_porosity_at_ice_surface
nml_option.description: Specifies the snow porosity (volume of air/total volume) at the ice surface
nml_option.possible_values: real between 0 and 1 or negative. If negative, compute porosity from snow density

nml_option.name: config_new_ice_fraction_biotracer
nml_option.description: Fraction of biological tracer retained as new sea ice is formed from ocean water
nml_option.possible_values: positive real number less than or equal to 1

nml_option.name: config_fraction_biotracer_in_frazil
nml_option.description: Factor multiplying the ocean concentration of a biological tracer in new frazil ice

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Si_to_N_diatoms
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of silicate to nitrogen in diatoms

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Si_to_N_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of silicate to nitrogen in small plankton

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Si_to_N_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of silicate to nitrogen in phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_ratio_S_to_N_diatoms
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of sulfur to nitrogen in diatoms

nml_option.name: config_ratio_S_to_N_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of sulfur to nitrogen in small plankeon

nml_option.name: config_ratio_S_to_N_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of sulfur to nitrogen in phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_C_diatoms
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of iron to carbon in diatoms

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_C_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of iron to carbon in small plankton

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_C_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of iron to carbon in phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_N_diatoms
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of iron to nitrogen in diatoms

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_N_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of iron to nitrogen in small plankton

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_N_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of iron to nitrogen in phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_DON
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of iron to dissolved organic nitrogen

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_DOC_saccharids
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of iron to poly/saccharid carbon

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_DOC_lipids
nml_option.description: Sets the ratio of iron to lipid carbon

nml_option.name: config_respiration_fraction_of_growth
nml_option.description: Fraction of algal growth that is lost due to respiration

nml_option.name: config_rapid_mobile_to_stationary_time
nml_option.description: Rapid adsorption timescale

nml_option.name: config_long_mobile_to_stationary_time
nml_option.description: Slow adsorption timescale

nml_option.name: config_algal_maximum_velocity
nml_option.description: Maximum speed at which diatoms can move

nml_option.name: config_ratio_Fe_to_dust
nml_option.description: Mass ratio of iron in dust

nml_option.name: config_solubility_of_Fe_in_dust
nml_option.description: Fraction of iron that is soluble
nml_option.possible_values: real number between and including zero and one

nml_option.name: config_chla_absorptivity_of_diatoms
nml_option.description: Absorptivity of chlorophyll in diatoms

nml_option.name: config_chla_absorptivity_of_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Absorptivity of chlorophyll in small plankton

nml_option.name: config_chla_absorptivity_of_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Absorptivity of chlorophyll in phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_light_attenuation_diatoms
nml_option.description: Controls the ability of diatoms to utilize light

nml_option.name: config_light_attenuation_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Controls the ability of small plankton to utilize light

nml_option.name: config_light_attenuation_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Controls the ability of phaeocystis to utilize light

nml_option.name: config_light_inhibition_diatoms
nml_option.description: Controls the strength of light inhibition to growth for diatoms

nml_option.name: config_light_inhibition_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Controls the strength of light inhibition to growth for small plankton

nml_option.name: config_light_inhibition_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Controls the strength of light inhibition to growth for phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_maximum_growth_rate_diatoms
nml_option.description: Maximum growth rate for diatoms

nml_option.name: config_maximum_growth_rate_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Maximum growth rate for small plankton

nml_option.name: config_maximum_growth_rate_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Maximum growth rate for phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_temperature_growth_diatoms
nml_option.description: Controls the temperature dependence of growth for diatoms

nml_option.name: config_temperature_growth_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Controls the temperature dependence of growth for small plankton

nml_option.name: config_temperature_growth_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Controls the temperature dependence of growth for phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_grazed_fraction_diatoms
nml_option.description: Fraction of diatom biomass grazed
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than 1

nml_option.name: config_grazed_fraction_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Fraction of small plankton biomass grazed
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than 1

nml_option.name: config_grazed_fraction_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Fraction of phaeocystis biomass grazed
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than 1

nml_option.name: config_mortality_diatoms
nml_option.description: Mortality rate of diatoms

nml_option.name: config_mortality_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Mortality rate of small plankton

nml_option.name: config_mortality_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Mortality rate of phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_temperature_mortality_diatoms
nml_option.description: Temperature dependence of diatom mortality rate

nml_option.name: config_temperature_mortality_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Temperature dependence of small plankton mortality rate

nml_option.name: config_temperature_mortality_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Temperature dependence of phaeocystis mortality rate

nml_option.name: config_exudation_diatoms
nml_option.description: Rate diatoms exude DOC

nml_option.name: config_exudation_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Rate small plankton exude DOC

nml_option.name: config_exudation_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Rate phaeocystis exude DOC

nml_option.name: config_nitrate_saturation_diatoms
nml_option.description: Nitrate half saturation for diatom growth

nml_option.name: config_nitrate_saturation_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Nitrate half saturation for small plankton growth

nml_option.name: config_nitrate_saturation_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Nitrate half saturation for phaeocystis growth

nml_option.name: config_ammonium_saturation_diatoms
nml_option.description: Ammonium half saturation for diatom growth

nml_option.name: config_ammonium_saturation_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Ammonium half saturation for small plankton growth

nml_option.name: config_ammonium_saturation_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Ammonium half saturation for phaeocystis growth

nml_option.name: config_silicate_saturation_diatoms
nml_option.description: Silicate half saturation for diatom growth

nml_option.name: config_silicate_saturation_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Silicate half saturation for small plankton growth

nml_option.name: config_silicate_saturation_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Silicate half saturation for phaeocystis growth

nml_option.name: config_iron_saturation_diatoms
nml_option.description: Iron half saturation for diatom growth

nml_option.name: config_iron_saturation_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Iron half saturation for small plankton growth

nml_option.name: config_iron_saturation_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Iron half saturation for phaeocystis growth

nml_option.name: config_fraction_spilled_to_DON
nml_option.description: Fraction of spilled grazing to proteins
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than or equal to 1

nml_option.name: config_degredation_of_DON
nml_option.description: Bacterial degredation of DON

nml_option.name: config_fraction_DON_ammonium
nml_option.description: Fraction of remineralized DON converted to ammonium
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than or equal to 1

nml_option.name: config_fraction_loss_to_saccharids
nml_option.description: Fraction of mortality to poly/saccharids
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than 1

nml_option.name: config_fraction_loss_to_lipids
nml_option.description: Fraction of mortality to lipids
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than 1

nml_option.name: config_fraction_exudation_to_saccharids
nml_option.description: Fracton of exudation to poly/saccharids
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than or equal to 1

nml_option.name: config_fraction_exudation_to_lipids
nml_option.description: Fraction of exudation to lipids
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than or equal to 1

nml_option.name: config_remineralization_saccharids
nml_option.description: Bacterial degredaton rate of poly/saccarids

nml_option.name: config_remineralization_lipids
nml_option.description: Bacterial degredation rate of lipids

nml_option.name: config_maximum_brine_temperature
nml_option.description: Maximum brine temperature

nml_option.name: config_salinity_dependence_of_growth
nml_option.description: Salinity limitation factor

nml_option.name: config_minimum_optical_depth
nml_option.description: Minimum optical depth above which light attenuates

nml_option.name: config_slopped_grazing_fraction
nml_option.description: Fraction of grazing spilled or slopped
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than 1

nml_option.name: config_excreted_fraction
nml_option.description: Fraction of assimilation excreted
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than 1

nml_option.name: config_fraction_mortality_to_ammonium
nml_option.description: Fraction of mortality to ammonium
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than 1

nml_option.name: config_fraction_iron_remineralized
nml_option.description: Fraction of remineralized iron
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than or equal to 1

nml_option.name: config_nitrification_rate
nml_option.description: Nitrification rate

nml_option.name: config_desorption_loss_particulate_iron
nml_option.description: Desorption rate of particulate iron to dissolved iron

nml_option.name: config_maximum_loss_fraction
nml_option.description: Maximum uptake fraction in a single timestep
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than 1

nml_option.name: config_maximum_ratio_iron_to_saccharids
nml_option.description: Optimal ratio of dissolved iron to poly/saccharids in the brine

nml_option.name: config_respiration_loss_to_DMSPd
nml_option.description: Fraction of respiration loss as DMSPd
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than or equal to 1

nml_option.name: config_DMSP_to_DMS_conversion_fraction
nml_option.description: Fraction of conversion to DMS given high yield
nml_option.possible_values: zero or positive real less than or equal to 1

nml_option.name: config_DMSP_to_DMS_conversion_time
nml_option.description: Stefels conversion time

nml_option.name: config_DMS_oxidation_time
nml_option.description: DMS oxidation time

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_diatoms
nml_option.description: Transport type of diatoms
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Transport type of small plankton
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Transport type of phaeocystis
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_nitrate
nml_option.description: Transport type of nitrate
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_ammonium
nml_option.description: Transport type of ammonium
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_silicate
nml_option.description: Transport type of silicate
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_DMSPp
nml_option.description: Transport type of particulate DMSP
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_DMSPd
nml_option.description: Transport type of dissolved DMSP
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_humics
nml_option.description: Transport type of humics
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_saccharids
nml_option.description: Transport type of poly/saccharids
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_lipids
nml_option.description: Transport type of lipids
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_inorganic_carbon
nml_option.description: Transport type of dissolved inorganic carbon
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_proteins
nml_option.description: Transport type of proteins
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_dissolved_iron
nml_option.description: Transport type of dissolved iron
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_particulate_iron
nml_option.description: Transport type of particulate iron
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_black_carbon1
nml_option.description: Transport type of black carbon 1 pool
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_black_carbon2
nml_option.description: Transport type of black carbon 1 pool
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_dust1
nml_option.description: Transport type of dust pool 1
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_dust2
nml_option.description: Transport type of dust pool 2
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_dust3
nml_option.description: Transport type of dust pool 3
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_mobility_type_dust4
nml_option.description: Transport type of dust pool 4
nml_option.possible_values: -1 = entirely in the mobile phase; 0 = retention dominated; 1 = release dominated; 0.5 = equal but rapid exchange; 2 = equal but slow exchange

nml_option.name: config_ratio_C_to_N_diatoms
nml_option.description: Algal carbon to nitrogen mole ratio for diatoms

nml_option.name: config_ratio_C_to_N_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Algal carbon to nitrogen mole ratio for small plankton

nml_option.name: config_ratio_C_to_N_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Algal carbon to nitrogen mole ratio for phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_ratio_chla_to_N_diatoms
nml_option.description: Algal chlorophyll to nitrogen ratio for diatoms

nml_option.name: config_ratio_chla_to_N_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Algal chlorophyll to nitrogen ratio for small plankton

nml_option.name: config_ratio_chla_to_N_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Algal chlorophyll to nitrogen ratio for phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_scales_absorption_diatoms
nml_option.description: Scales absorbed radiation for diatoms

nml_option.name: config_scales_absorption_small_plankton
nml_option.description: Scales absorbed radiation for small plankton

nml_option.name: config_scales_absorption_phaeocystis
nml_option.description: Scales absorbed radiation for phaeocystis

nml_option.name: config_ratio_C_to_N_proteins
nml_option.description: Ratio of carbon to nitrogen in proteins

nml_option.name: config_shortwave_type
nml_option.description: Shortwave radiation method.

nml_option.name: config_albedo_type
nml_option.description: Albedo parameterization type.

nml_option.name: config_use_snicar_ad
nml_option.description: If true turn on snicar_ad 5-band snow system

nml_option.name: config_visible_ice_albedo
nml_option.description: Visible ice albedo for ice thickness greater than config_variable_albedo_thickness_limit.

nml_option.name: config_infrared_ice_albedo
nml_option.description: Near-IR ice albedo for ice thickness greater than config_variable_albedo_thickness_limit.

nml_option.name: config_visible_snow_albedo
nml_option.description: Visible cold snow albedo.

nml_option.name: config_infrared_snow_albedo
nml_option.description: Near-IR cold snow albedo.

nml_option.name: config_variable_albedo_thickness_limit
nml_option.description: Ice thickness above which the ice albedo is constant.

nml_option.name: config_ice_shortwave_tuning_parameter
nml_option.description: Sea ice tuning parameter; +1 for 1sig increase in albedo.

nml_option.name: config_pond_shortwave_tuning_parameter
nml_option.description: Ponded ice tuning parameter; +1 for 1sig increase in albedo.

nml_option.name: config_snow_shortwave_tuning_parameter
nml_option.description: Snow tuning parameter; +1 for ~.01 change in broadband albedo.

nml_option.name: config_temp_change_snow_grain_radius_change
nml_option.description: Change in temperture for non-melt to melt snow grain radius change.

nml_option.name: config_max_melting_snow_grain_radius
nml_option.description: Maximum melting snow grain radius.

nml_option.name: config_algae_absorption_coefficient
nml_option.description: Algae absorption coefficient for 0.5 m thick layer.

nml_option.name: config_snow_redistribution_scheme
nml_option.description: Use a snow redistribution scheme
nml_option.possible_values: '30percent (30% rule, precip only)','30percentsw (30% rulewith shortwave)','ITDsd (Lecomte PhD, 2014)','ITDrdg (like ITDsd but use level/ridged ice)','default or none (none)'

nml_option.name: config_fallen_snow_radius
nml_option.description: fallen snow grain radius

nml_option.name: config_use_snow_liquid_ponds
nml_option.description: use snow liquid tracer for ponds

nml_option.name: config_new_snow_density
nml_option.description: new snow density

nml_option.name: config_max_snow_density
nml_option.description: maximum snow density

nml_option.name: config_minimum_wind_compaction
nml_option.description: minimum wind speed to compact snow

nml_option.name: config_wind_compaction_factor
nml_option.description: wind compaction factor

nml_option.name: config_max_dry_snow_radius
nml_option.description: maximum dry metamorphism snow grain radius

nml_option.name: config_snow_to_ice_transition_depth
nml_option.description: Snow depth for transition to bare sea ice.

nml_option.name: config_pond_refreezing_type
nml_option.description: Pond refreezing parameterization.

nml_option.name: config_pond_flushing_timescale
nml_option.description: Alter e-folding time scale for flushing.?????

nml_option.name: config_min_meltwater_retained_fraction
nml_option.description: Minimum retained fraction of meltwater.

nml_option.name: config_max_meltwater_retained_fraction
nml_option.description: Maximum retained fraction of meltwater.

nml_option.name: config_pond_depth_to_fraction_ratio
nml_option.description: Ratio of pond depth to pond fraction.

nml_option.name: config_snow_on_pond_ice_tapering_parameter
nml_option.description: Tapering parameter for snow on pond ice.

nml_option.name: config_critical_pond_ice_thickness
nml_option.description: Critical parameter for pond ice thickness.

nml_option.name: config_thermodynamics_type
nml_option.description: Vertical themodynamics type.

nml_option.name: config_heat_conductivity_type
nml_option.description: Thermal conductivity type for BL99 thermodynamics. Options are Maykut and Untersteiner 1971 form (with Wettlaufer 1991 constants), or Pringle et al JGR 2007 'bubbly brine'

nml_option.name: config_rapid_mode_channel_radius
nml_option.description: Channel radius for rapid gravity drainage mode.

nml_option.name: config_rapid_model_critical_Ra
nml_option.description: Critical Rayleigh number for rapid gravity drainage mode.

nml_option.name: config_rapid_mode_aspect_ratio
nml_option.description: Aspect ratio for rapid gravity drainage mode (larger=wider).

nml_option.name: config_slow_mode_drainage_strength
nml_option.description: Slow gravity drainage mode drainage strength.

nml_option.name: config_slow_mode_critical_porosity
nml_option.description: Liquid fraction porosity cutoff for slow gravity drainage mode.

nml_option.name: config_congelation_ice_porosity
nml_option.description: Liquid fraction of congelation ice.

nml_option.name: config_itd_conversion_type
nml_option.description: Type of ice thickness distribution conversions.

nml_option.name: config_category_bounds_type
nml_option.description: Type of ice thickness category bounds.

nml_option.name: config_ice_strength_formulation
nml_option.description: Type of ice strength formulation.

nml_option.name: config_ridging_participation_function
nml_option.description: Type of ridging participation function.

nml_option.name: config_ridging_redistribution_function
nml_option.description: Type of ridging redistribution function.

nml_option.name: config_ridiging_efolding_scale
nml_option.description: E-folding scale of ridged ice (krdg_redist = 1)

nml_option.name: config_ratio_ridging_work_to_PE
nml_option.description: Ratio of ridging work to PE change in ridging (kstrength = 1)

nml_option.name: config_atmos_boundary_method
nml_option.description: Atmosphere boundary method.

nml_option.name: config_calc_surface_stresses
nml_option.description: If true calculate wind stress components.

nml_option.name: config_calc_surface_temperature
nml_option.description: If true calculate surface temperature. If false surface temperature is computed elsewhere and atmos-ice fluxes are provided.

nml_option.name: config_use_form_drag
nml_option.description: If true calculate form drag.

nml_option.name: config_use_high_frequency_coupling
nml_option.description: If true use high frequency coupling.

nml_option.name: config_boundary_layer_iteration_number
nml_option.description: Number of iterations for boundary layer calculations

nml_option.name: config_use_ocean_mixed_layer
nml_option.description: If true use an ocean mixed layer.

nml_option.name: config_min_friction_velocity
nml_option.description: Minimum friction velocity for ice-ocean heat flux.

nml_option.name: config_ocean_heat_transfer_type
nml_option.description: Transfer coefficient type for ice-ocean heat flux.

nml_option.name: config_sea_freezing_temperature_type
nml_option.description: Form of ocean freezing temperature.

nml_option.name: config_ocean_surface_type
nml_option.description: Type of coupled ocean surface: (MPAS-O:'free'), (SOM:'non-free')

nml_option.name: config_use_data_icebergs
nml_option.description: Use data iceberg meltwater forcing

package.name: pkgColumnTracerEffectiveSnowDensity
package.description: Computes effective snow density based on liquid and ice snow content and snow compaction

package.name: pkgColumnTracerSnowGrainRadius
package.description: Evolves snow grain radius for radiative transfer based on dry and wet metamorphism

package.name: pkgSnicar
package.description: add snicar 5 bands snow SSP in CICE

var.name: totalCarbonContentCell
var.description: Concentration of carbon in the ice column

var.name: totalOceanCarbonFlux
var.description: Total ocean carbon flux (positive into the ocean)

var.name: oceanBioFluxes
var.description: Tracers are ordered: diatom nitrogen, smallPlankton nitrogen, phaeocystis nitrogen, nitrate, polysaccarid carbon, lipid carbon, ammonium, silicate, DMSPp, DMSPd, DMS, Nonreactive nitrate, Protein nitrogen, dissolved iron in umol/m2/s, particulate iron in umol/m2/s, humic carbon, black carbon1 in mg/m2/s, black carbon2 in mg/m2/s, dust1 in mg/m2/s, dust2 in mg/m2/s, dust3 in mg/m2/s, dust4 in mg/m2/s

var.name: oceanBioFluxesCategory
var.description: Tracers are ordered: diatom nitrogen, smallPlankton nitrogen, phaeocystis nitrogen, nitrate, polysaccarid carbon, lipid carbon, ammonium, silicate, DMSPp, DMSPd, DMS, Nonreactive nitrate, Protein nitrogen, dissolved iron in umol/m2/s, particulate iron in umol/m2/s, humic carbon, black carbon1 in mg/m2/s, black carbon2 in mg/m2/s, dust1 in mg/m2/s, dust2 in mg/m2/s, dust3 in mg/m2/s, dust4 in mg/m2/s

var.name: oceanBioConcentrations
var.description: Tracers are ordered: diatom nitrogen, smallPlankton nitrogen, phaeocystis nitrogen, nitrate, polysaccarid carbon, lipid carbon, ammonium, silicate, DMSPp, DMSPd, DMS, Nonreactive nitrate, Protein nitrogen, dissolved iron in umol/m3, particulate iron in umol/m3, humic carbon, black carbon1 in mg/m3, black carbon2 in mg/m3,dust1 in mg/m3, dust2 in mg/m3, dust3 in mg/m3, dust4 in mg/m3

var.name: bioShortwaveFlux
var.description: Shortwave radiative flux on the vertical biology grid per category

var.name: bioShortwaveFluxCell
var.description: Averaged cell shortwave radiative flux on the vertical biology grid

var.name: netSpecificAlgalGrowthRate
var.description: Specific algal growth rate per grid cell

var.name: netNitrateUptake
var.description: Total rate of nitrate uptake by algae weighted by ice area

var.name: netAmmoniumUptake
var.description: Total rate of ammonium uptake by algae weighted by ice area

var.name: primaryProduction
var.description: Average total primary production in a grid cell

var.name: totalVerticalBiologyIce
var.description: Tracers are ordered: diatom nitrogen, smallPlankton nitrogen, phaeocystis nitrogen, nitrate, polysaccarid carbon, lipid carbon, ammonium, silicate, DMSPp, DMSPd, DMS, Nonreactive nitrate, Protein nitrogen, dissolved iron in umol/m2, particulate iron in umol/m2, humic carbon, black carbon1 in mg/m2, black carbon2 in mg/m2,dust1 in mg/m2, dust2 in mg/m2, dust3 in mg/m2, dust4 in mg/m2

var.name: totalVerticalBiologySnow
var.description: Tracers are ordered: diatom nitrogen, smallPlankton nitrogen, phaeocystis nitrogen, nitrate, polysaccarid carbon, lipid carbon, ammonium, silicate, DMSPp, DMSPd, DMS, Nonreactive nitrate, Protein nitrogen, dissolved iron in umol/m2, particulate iron in umol/m2, humic carbon, black carbon1 in mg/m2, black carbon2 in mg/m2,dust1 in mg/m2, dust2 in mg/m2, dust3 in mg/m2, dust4 in mg/m2

var.name: totalChlorophyll
var.description: Ice integrated chlorophyll concentration per cell

var.name: totalNitrate
var.description: Ice integrated nitrate concentration per cell

var.name: bgridPorosityIceCell
var.description: Cell ice volume weighted average brine porosity on ice interface biological grid

var.name: bgridSalinityIceCell
var.description: Cell ice volume weighted average salinity on ice interface biological grid

var.name: bgridTemperatureIceCell
var.description: Cell ice volume weighted average temperature on ice interface biological grid
